# Rslib

> Rslib is a library development tool that leverages the well-designed configurations and plugins of Rsbuild.

## Guide

- [Introduction](/guide/start/index.md)
- [Quick start](/guide/start/quick-start.md)
- [Glossary](/guide/start/glossary.md)

- [Solution](/guide/solution/index.md)
- [Node.js](/guide/solution/nodejs.md)
- [React](/guide/solution/react.md)
- [Vue](/guide/solution/vue.md)
- [CLI](/guide/basic/cli.md)
- [Configure Rslib](/guide/basic/configure-rslib.md)
- [Use TypeScript](/guide/basic/typescript.md)
- [Output format](/guide/basic/output-format.md)
- [Output structure](/guide/basic/output-structure.md)
- [Upgrade Rslib](/guide/basic/upgrade-rslib.md)
- [Handle third-party dependencies](/guide/advanced/third-party-deps.md)
- [Output compatibility](/guide/advanced/output-compatibility.md)
- [Declaration files](/guide/advanced/dts.md)
- [Import static assets](/guide/advanced/static-assets.md)
- [Import SVGR](/guide/advanced/svgr-files.md)
- [Import JSON files](/guide/advanced/json-files.md)
- [Module Federation](/guide/advanced/module-federation.md)
- [Use Storybook](/guide/advanced/storybook.md)
- [Modern.js Module](/guide/migration/modernjs-module.md)
- [tsup](/guide/migration/tsup.md)
- [Features FAQ](/guide/faq/features.md)
